api.title: Connect your Synology Surveillance Station
api.description: Provide the location and credentials to connect to your NAS and get access to Surveillance Station.
api.otp_description: Your account has been configured to use 2-Step Verification. Type your 6-digit code below to verify this action.

motion.title: Would you like to enable motion detection?
motion.description: Would you like to enable motion detection? This will create an Actionrule at the Surveillance Station.
motion.footnote: You need to have write permissions for the Surveillance Station to make this work.

nostation.title: No Surveillance Station found
nostation.description: No Surveillance Station found. Please add your Surveillance Station to your Homey first.

camera.title: Connect your camera to your Surveillance Station
camera.description: You need to add your Synology Surveillance Station first to be able to add your camera's. Please select your Surveillance Station below to add your camera's.
camera.done: Great! Your device is connected again.

api.title: Reconnect your Synology Surveillance Station
api.done: Great! Your device is connected again.

camera.title: Connect your camera to your Surveillance Station
camera.description: You need to add your Synology Surveillance Station first to be able to add your camera's. Please select your Surveillance Station below.
camera.done: Great! Your device is connected again.

exception.authentication_failed: Authentication failed, please repair your Surveillance Station
exception.rule_update_failed: Could not update or create rule, please make sure the user is a member of the administrator group in your Surveillance Station.

exception.validate_pair_timeout: Timeout, please make sure the settings are correct
